posts.post_content: I recently picked up the T213-2 card in this pose, with the great ".300 batter 7 years" caption.  Makes me want to pick up a few of the other versions of this pose.  I have the T206 with a Piedmont 350 back, but need everything else including some fairly easy ones.  Anyone got a Donlin Batting with any back besides the P350 available?  Looking for P-G range, low grade just for fun type cards.
